title: RLC 1v1 Championship Returns!

embed.description: Welcome back to our third running of the Risen Leaden Champions 1v1 league! We are super excited to be bringing this tournament back through very popular demand, and this time we're bringing it back with some extra added flair!

body:
Hey guys, super hyped to be announcing that we will be bringing back the RLC 1v1 league for it's third run!

The RLC III will have players battling it out on the Howling Abyss over a period of 8 weeks for the chance to qualify for the RLC Invitational event, Risen's biggest tournament yet. This will take place the week following, where the top 16 players from the league will be fighting for the RLC III crown, slowly but surely the greatest will near closer to face in the finale, and for the opportunity to be recognized as one of OCE's finest!

If you aren't familiar and would like to learn about how the RLC format works, please visit this link: 

There are no entry requirements and players of all ranks and skill levels are welcome, so, what are you waiting for? Come join us at https://battlefy.com/risen/rlc-iii-1v1-league-opening-week/5d6fb72f46083b6e6bafdda3/info?infoTab=details

Prizing:

1st: 4150RP + permanent emote/role in Discord

2nd: 3450RP

3rd: 2750RP

4th: 2050RP

5th-8th: 1350RP

9th-16th: 650RP

We will also be providing external $ prizing for this event, this will be updated once it is confirmed.
Please note: If the event grows further our RP prizing will also expand!

The opening week will take place on the 20th of September at 6PM AEST and the league will run through until the 15th of November where it will then close. If you'd like to learn all the technicals, rules and etc you should be able to find everything at the BATTTLEFY link or our Discord (which will be required on the day): https://discord.gg/zfArDf4
If you do have any questions or need further details please feel free to message me.

We'll also be streaming at twitch.tv/realrisen/ ;)

We hope you're ready for the most competitive and ambitious RLC yet.
See you all there!
